sentences.cn: 所有的碳水化合物均来自植物。

sentences.en: All theories originate from practice and in turn serve practice.
sentences.cn: 任何理论都来源于实践,反过来为实践服务.

sentences.en: Ba people originate from the ancestor of Linjun living in Wuyan.
sentences.cn: 巴人源流始于廪君之先,出自巫蜒.

sentences.en: Clearly, species can originate in a variety of ways.
sentences.cn: 显然, 物种可以以多种方式进化.

sentences.en: Distributing: Originate in European south formerly , it is hybrid strain more.
sentences.cn: 分布: 原产于欧洲南部, 多为杂交种.

sentences.en: Esophageal carcinomas probably originate from glands propria of esophagus.
sentences.cn: 食管腺癌可能起源于食管固有腺.

sentences.en: Fine bubbles originate in the lower respiratory tract.
sentences.cn: 小汽泡则来自下呼吸道.

sentences.en: Fungal - decay can, in fact , originate within the standing tree.
sentences.cn: 菌腐朽可起源于立木阶段.
这个计划最早是怎么想到的？

sentences.en: It important to clarify the source from which communications originate.
sentences.cn: 资讯科技'重要的澄清沟通起于的来源.

sentences.en: Middle - latitude cyclones originate at the popar front.
sentences.cn: 中纬度 地区的气旋发源于极锋.

sentences.en: The Geminides originate from mysterious 3200 Phaethon , which is an asteroid.
sentences.cn: 双子座流星雨是由神秘的第3200号小行星“非以颂”产生的.

sentences.en: The man can neither originate varieties, nor prevent their occurrence.
sentences.cn: 人类既不能创造变种, 亦不能阻止变种发生.

sentences.en: The technique was originated by an Italian artist.
sentences.cn: 这种技艺由一位意大利艺术家首创。

sentences.en: The theory of evolution did not originate with Darwin.
sentences.cn: 进化论并非始自达尔文.

sentences.en: These rays originate at different points of the source.
sentences.cn: 这些光线是以光源上的不同点发出的.

sentences.en: You mean Beijing opera did not originate in Beijing, did it?
sentences.cn: 您是说剧并不起源于北京, 是 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 原始的；最初的；独创的；新颖的
有创作力的；有发明之才能的
创意；独创性，创造力；原始；新奇

trans.tran_en: to come from a particular place or start in a particular situation
When something originates or when someone originates it, it begins to happen or exist

trans.tran_cn: 引起，创始，创作，开始，发生，发明
trans.tran_en: to have the idea for something and start it
